result.purpose: This folder is responsible for defining GitHub Actions workflows for various automation tasks related to CI/CD processes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern where each YAML file defines a specific workflow for automation tasks, allowing for easy integration and management of CI/CD processes.

.github/workflows/check.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for checking security and building on pull requests to the main branch.

.github/workflows/dockerize.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for Dockerizing a mobile wallet manager.
side_effects: Triggers on push and pull request events
risks: Exposure of sensitive information if secrets are not managed properly

.github/workflows/golangci-lint.yml.purpose: Configuration file for GitHub Actions to run golangci-lint on push and pull request events.
side_effects: Triggers linting process on code changes
risks: Exposure of secrets if not properly managed

.github/workflows/sentry.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for Sentry release management.
